title: Inside China's buzzing AI scene year after DeepSeek shock
description: Before DeepSeek shook up the tech world and put Chinese artificial intelligence on the map, Wu Chenglin's own startup had nearly folded three times -- but in the past year it has raised $30 million. But as excitement around DeepSeek fuelled a boom in spending, Wu raised 220 million yuan in two funding rounds.

title: AI job anxiety is highest among young workers, Randstad survey reveals
description: A survey by Randstad found that 80% of workers believe artificial intelligence will affect their daily tasks at work, with Gen Z being the most concerned.
